contact.body_0: We would love to hear from you!
contact.body_1: We would love to hear from you! Do you have any questions for us? Suggestions perhaps? Or do you maybe want to collaborate? Send us an email with you query on: office@uskillity.de
contact.body_2: If you have general questions look at our help secrtion on the left or check our posts on Facebook or Instagram.

termsandconditions.body_0: Please read these Terms of Service carefully as they contain important information about your legal rights, remedies and obligations. By accessing or using the u/skillity Platform, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms of Service.

share_skill.header_1: We are so glad you want to share your skill with us. You are doing a great deed to the well-being of all of us!
share_skill.header_2: It might take up to two days for us to process your application. We do this only to escape vulgarities and inappropriate posts. We also give feedback towards the presentation of your skill, so you can have more success conducting it.<1>{" "}</1>
share_skill.description_placeholder: Explain more in detail what people can learn from your skill
share_skill.additional_requirements_placeholder: Ex. basic knowledge of ... only participants that can bring/have ...
share_skill.location_placeholder: Where you will be teaching your skill
share_skill.button_add_another_date: Add another day to the same course
share_skill.checkbox_agreement: I herby declare that I read the the terms and conditions as stated on this website and agrre with them
